attributes.action: Substitute a maximum speed limit for the increased road tax for the most polluting cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The present system of increased taxation for the highest-emission cars (L & M say, such as 4*4s) does nothing to make them more economical once purchased.  By substituting a maximum speed limit of 60mph on all roads we could make the existing cars less damaging and discourage their purchase as fashion items, all without penalizing those such as farmers who actually need them.
